lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, before we jump into tonight's session, let's go ahead and get through some of our announcements, beginning with our fantastic returning sponsor for campaign two, D&D Beyond. Sam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She wasn't even in cheer squad, she was in dance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ready? Okay! D&D! Beyond! D&D! Beyond! Table! On this side! Show me! Your D&D pride! Yell D&D! Beyond!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Table! On this side! (laughter) Please make! This ad die! (laughter) Yeah! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have been a cheerleader!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vying for one of the more violent ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So let's get to the rest of our announcements, Travis, you got some things to talk about, I believe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah, I do! Yes! For the month of November-- (laughter) (stammering) Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Critical Role has partnered once again with one of our favorite charities, OSD.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a month long push, so please consider donating or at least sharing the message and you can see all of that goodness and all the details and more at critrole.com/OSD.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun to throw you off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On that note, in case you missed it, (laughs) earlier this week we made an announcement that we are going to push part four, the finale of UnDeadwood by one week to November 15th. That's not this Friday, not tomorrow, but the Friday after next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had some technical difficulties in post, and a few very frustrating hurdles that we had to get over, but we are good and back on track, but didn't want to destroy our team.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it Brian's hair, is it Brian's hair, like, you had to CG it all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We-- oh! He's going to hate if I out him on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, his hair product caught fire or what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you do something to his hair?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to stay fresh in the editing room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But yeah, tune in on the 15th, that's this next Friday, 7:00pm for part four of UnDeadwood. Promise you, it's crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been picked up by (shouting) Amazon Prime Video! (normal voice) Which is huge, and because of that partnership, we are able to create two additional episodes for the first season, so now 10 episodes has become 12 for season one, (shouting) and a second season of 12 episodes! 24 total episodes! (laughter) Is this too big? Is this too big?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of those details to come, and if you want to see where are the details are listed, you can head to our Kickstarter page, but I can tell you, we've been hard at work with all of our friends at Titmouse, already making this thing amazing, scripts are in, designs are in, location, background art is in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so hard not to just like, should I just show them on my phone? (laughter) Okay. In due time, there will be a rollout.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will be, right? We will be rolling out some art pretty soon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So thank you again to Amazon Prime Video, thank you again to our partners at Titmouse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you to the backers for making this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Travis. (laughs) Laura, you got some updates, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah! It's not as cool as all of that, but it's still pretty cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So number one! Merch in the store, it's all merch in the store, but number one is the finishing of our collection of our Mighty Nein chibis!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there's Fjord and there's Nott, and there's Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keeping me so warm and toasty!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is our blanket, it's so incredibly soft, it's the map by Deven Rue, and I love it, and I'm just so happy that we got this made.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a blanket, it's a map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, do you want to snuggle up in it? Feel how soft it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legitimately fell asleep wrapped in that when we finished Barry season two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome, it's pretty comfy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just excited we get to make this stuff, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do anything through the hole in the sheet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything we make is mostly so we get one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially our whole merch plan is just make stuff we want to have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And hopefully you guys want them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running out of room, so slow down! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, thank you so much, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been given freedom and I love it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (water bubbling) (thunder) (explosion) ♪ Role, role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical, critical ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames ♪ ♪ For the battles ahead ♪ ♪ The villains beware, 'cause you're about to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role (Roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Critical Role (Roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But amongst that is just this sense of dread and weight on your shoulders as the sheer volume and gravity of what you've all recently heard comes to take your mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a thing that's happening right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're reacting to the ritual, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tharizdun, Tharizdun! I think, I feel like we need to practice saying it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been talking about him, he's come up a few times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like, crazy, crazy old, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think we can take him, because he's real old?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If someone wishes to make a religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Not too bad, not too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While it is lumped with it, it is something other entirely, possibly older in the world, no one knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is strange, it is aberrant, and it is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know, does anyone, do any of us know what separates Tharizdun from our plane of existence? Is there a gate or a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that time period, Ioun and Pelor spearheaded the assault against the roiling, hungry, black void that was the entity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They banished him, but the struggle left Ioun with a terrible wound that would not heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is said, because you've rolled so high on religion--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the volcano, right? I don't remember where we learned that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is also said that multiple sets of divine shackles hold the Chained Oblivion at the bottom of the Abyss, their power anchored somewhere in Exandria.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you rolled what on a religion check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this beyond common knowledge, the existence of Tharizdun? This is something that only people with esoteric knowledge or vast amounts of study know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many people who are of some level of intellectual knowledge and training acknowledge that it existed, but as it is with a lot of mortal entities that are so caught up with their own day-to-day business, it seems that something so far off--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's older and weirder than us knowing stories of Zeus turning into a bull and, you know, stuff like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This thing's like Mike Tyson at the end of Punch Out! Nobody wants to fight this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to go down with one hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who do we know who belongs to this cult, "if there is. If this who all who you are chasing, "who you are after, who do we know "is connected to this entity?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm, he can make himself look like other people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he has control of our friend Yasha, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And when I was looking at them through scrying, you know what that is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she's got a thing on the back of her neck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But she might have also been evil the whole time, and just sort of, we didn't know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this thing on the back of the neck, you say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is like, and I describe it, exactly like I saw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you saw, it looked, the faint orange glow reminiscent of the old car cigarette lighters, that faint reddish--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right at the base of the neck, underneath the hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But Yussa contemplates after what you say and goes, "If this Obann is able to "continue to control your ally, "is this by the same means, or are the others "as to why he's able to bind the champions of other betrayers "to his will as well?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I did see the light coming from the Laughing Hand, I think, didn't I? Yes, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because if the Laughing Hand is a champion of Torog, "and this other one that you had mentioned--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Caedogeist, as you said, yes, is born from, "was it Asmodeus and--?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is no reason for these things to follow "the intent of such a creature "of madness and disparate will as Tharizdun."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we killed him and he instantly came back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is rare for something of sound mind "to want to follow such utter destruction "of the planes and beyond."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or maybe it was always manipulation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if Obann is a devil, and he's from the...Hells? It can be that he's working on executing the orders of a devil prince? A king,? Someone from hell is trying to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tharizdun is one of the entities "that resides at the bottom of the Abyss, "which is more of the demonic heritage."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a lot of mixed up factions here, "which is why I wonder." And you actually, because you rolled so fucking high on religion, regarding Tharizdun--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you know that the higher acolytes of Tharizdun, as part of their ritual of ascension and to show their true faith, often remove their eyes so they can peer through shadow and light with his boon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there's also, I mean, they're connected to this larger conspiracy within the war and factions within it, so god only knows how deep this runs and how many people are involved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well once again, if they're attracted to fractured people that they could easily manipulate--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the same cult that's been pushing warfare on the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We know that Obann was referencing this individual who is within the Empire, high up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what was his fucking name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yussa leans forward. "You showed and told me "about this device that was opening rifts."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And was opening rifts to, you were saying?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(sighs) What purpose do these rifts possibly have "in this larger plan?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They seem to have infantry, monsters, beasts that they were sending through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if their location had something, if it was a greater network?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They seemed randomly placed, remember? They're somewhere in the backs of caves and weird mountains and stuff like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you can make intelligence checks, because you're the two with highest intellect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll have you know I rolled two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And through this, subtle influence of the Chained Oblivion may begin to creep into the world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like if you have a leather strap and you punch enough holes it'll eventually--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one way to put it, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And because you rolled so high on religion, you also do know that the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The characteristics of the Chained Oblivion's influence, the madness that it instills subtly, is said to slowly corrupt people with bouts of uncontrollable hunger, uncharacteristic aggression, and eventually violent mania.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to join that fishing boat with me? Anyone? The mackerel's biting this time of year.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We think the Chained Oblivion's on a fishing boat? Under the water! Yeah, it's really clever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I've been saying for a while that there's been recurring themes of hunger and famine and starvation and chains the entire time we've known each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but who's been hungry other than me and stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm really hungry all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I also kind of get pissed sometimes, I hide it, but what if I'm influenced by the Chained Oblivion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In Xhorhas, remember that, the furry creature, the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bugbear, right? He had bouts of violence and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anger. And Asarius, and we've talked to the, oh right, was that Asarius, is that what you just said? I mean, even going all the way back to Trostenwald, with the ner-- ner-gill--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, you got me on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I might have been making that part up, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But yes, the first time we met and we went to that circus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were fighting the devil toad who kept lashing out and eating people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Allura) "If this influence continues "to spill out into this world, "and people grow more and more aggressive, "that's going to lead to even further conflict."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the Bright Queen is affected by it? Was she eating every time we saw her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think she was ever eating when we saw her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Start playing ♪ you lift me up ♪

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it when you roughhouse! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are talking about some ancient--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what's the play here? What's the strategy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know what I would do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That question, if the Abyss is on the demonic side of things, and the devils and the demons have a spat, is there, is there any way that we would employ or try and reason with the devilish side of things to gain access to encourage--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but he's obviously trying to pull out of the demonic side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Abyss is on the other half.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we take down this crazy cult?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did make it easier to kill the Laughing Hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know how many there are in this cult and where they are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, we could get Blondie and get a bunch of information and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They did say the last time we scryed on them, that they were making their way towards the finish line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Allura) "Do we know know where these individuals are? "Where the next plot is, where the next anything is?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can scry on Yasha, we can scry on Blondie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have his spellbook; he's a dead mage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was worshiping the Crawling King.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Crawling King is a different entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. That has nothing to do with this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, but it's, but Torog is more or less still related in this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Laughing Hand was a champion of Torog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, he's still a player in this weird--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might just be a red herring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obann is a servant of Graz'zt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, that's what it feels like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, it doesn't matter who they used to be aligned with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know where the next event is happening, or where to cut anyone off, should we try and look in on the few that we are speaking on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we could peel Yasha away somehow, she would know more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yussa, do you have any thoughts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do have a friend in the Empire still, "though I am not really invited as much as I once was."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The introduction would be enough to gain an audience "and perhaps glean some information from within the "range of influence that the Assembly seems to have gathered."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Audience for us or for you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He can't go, he's not, chooses not to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you can go as my allies."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't we known by Oremid Hass?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can be open with Yussa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you leave the room for a second? Is that what you're going to say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just say it, just say it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're known by Oremid Hass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our last interaction with him did not go well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were at a cocktail party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was the guy who likes cats, and we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we break into this guy's house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! We just talked to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You talked to him at the party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said something to Ya- did he say something to Yasha?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trent said something to Yasha that was creepy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we were like, let's remember that for next time, he likes Frumpkin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember us making a note of that at all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've also been really researching this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't, oh sorry, go on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I was just going to say, we didn't attack him, he doesn't know that we're enemies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trent saw Caleb and didn't say anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there is a concern with this Trent, "who I believe I know who you're speaking of, "then just avoid him, do not bring him up."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can go see Oremid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's super duper powerful, didn't you know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They have a few dubious figures, "but not all of them are bad eggs."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, we're going to the Halls of Erudition?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if they can get that involved "in Imperial Wildemount politics so brazenly, "especially during a time of war, "but I'll see what can be done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you give us a list?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a cute turtle, if it makes any difference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the parchment drifts through the air and then folds, a ribbon ties itself on it, and it lands over on Jester's lap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How closely should we trust this person, how much information should we give them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're naturally mistrusting people, so it's always important to ask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a question that we could ask or perhaps some way of verifying that he is who you say he is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought you were talking about my ruby necklace, which is very beautiful, but yes, this is Sprinkle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oremid will react favorably to such a creature."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he likes all little furry creatures?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't say it out loud! Are you crazy? If she hasn't felt--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just stiff, hanging from a little string around--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hides inside my armor whenever we're in battle, and he's super duper protected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He hasn't been fed in months! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's assumed that she's been feeding him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every time I eat, imagine that I'm also giving Sprinkle food, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) He's a furry lover! Okay, cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which ones do you deem problematic and what do you estimate their problems to be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are the only ones that I've actually met in person."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I respect his techniques, "though his students may not always."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose the only question to ask is, will you be going back in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is a portion of Halas' fortune "that I managed to recover."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not in the room, no, thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Speaking of which." Looks over to the unconscious body of Halas (laughs) on the floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you got it right there, look at that. That's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, just out of curiosity, if you touch it, there's still a voice in there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are we? "Have we been successful in your escape?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would you change a body if you could?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that depends on what you wish to change it into. You see that--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I know you've looked into my research, "there are ways to, I believe, take a mortal body "and make it perpetual."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a spell or a ritual?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has gone on long enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know-- do you know what it is? Do you know it, or would you have to find it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if you release me from this gem, "I would help you to pursue whatever this may be."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to take the jewel from you, maybe you just put it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need something more concrete than that, the name of a spell, something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is unnamed at the moment, "but it was part of my design, "for myself and, should you be interested, "little goblin girl--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do I get you out if I wanted to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I snatch-- I'm going to attempt to snatch the jewel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you make an insight-- or you make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you say, sleight of hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) No, it was great. Good work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you could read lips, I see a lot of Fs and Ss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think she's that angry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those hands are not easy to mistake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think she's gotten it out of her-- oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think she's got it out of her system.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means "cracker." "More cracker." It's baby sign language.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can drop the spell, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very dangerous and powerful mage now knows your name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just good to know that he is still in there, which is where we want to keep him, right, Nott?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because if he gets out, he knows your name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he sound like he knew what he could do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He sounded confident that he could do something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has a restaurant called the Carving Board in the Happy Fun Ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He built a prison and left chests that murdered you in the blink of an eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I can't just leave it alone! It's the thing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think that the man who built that place would be willing to help you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't judge his taste in decor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, we have one option, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know that this is here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not if he sends it away to a far off place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know of a spell that would turn somebody into something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are-- polymorph is a relatively simple--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, put them back in their right body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone is in the wrong body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is not a permanent endeavor, "but it can become most anything."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have notes of his, they're incomplete, but, he felt like he was on the right track.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not nearly as deranged, and that's saying something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so, you'll still work at it and try?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you promise us that if we want to come back, do anymore research on Halas, that we have full access?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This. I don't know, what do you plan to do with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was going to get rid of it entirely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, the heart was technically sent off into nothing and Halas found it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unless I am mistaken, "that spirit can only return to that body, correct?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In but a matter of 20 seconds or so, the smell of burned flesh fills the chamber-- it's disgusting, before it slowly filters out the open window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look at that, now there is no longer worry "of him returning to his form."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe don't touch the stone and see if Halas needs an update.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's just let him continue to think otherwise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can everyone be quiet for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, might I speak to the goblin girl once more, "if you do not mind?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally, yeah, you know what? She actually just went out for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Doesn't feel so good now, does it? Huh, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh, you can't say anything back, can you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every word will come back to haunt us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't actually know if that'll-- she can't hear anything I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice continues through the gem because it is telepathic to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would-- Perhaps we could just put that-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mage Hand grasps it, and as the Mage Hand lifts in the air, he will not actually make physical contact with the stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the smart way to do it, drop Silence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts it onto a table, the same Mage Hand pulls--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just going to say you were going out to pee, and you'll be back never.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You cut off my joke, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't cut off your joke! He did!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking cut off my joke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the less said to something that may be able to tell the difference between the truth and a lie, and probably a lot more information just by us touching, it's a lot, that's not the sort of thing you should be touching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would have been the last thing he heard, he would have got a good joke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And when he eventually gets out--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then he'd be like, oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now he's wondering what the punch line was, and he'll wonder forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he'll eventually get out and find you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not going to get out! Don't worry, he's in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It opens. (imitates noisy hinges) Mage Hands the gem over onto the inside, it closes, and then, (imitates magical pop) and then vanishes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember that we found that in the middle of a Magic Fun Ball, inside a Dreadnought, inside a magic space, I mean, it's these things--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should be off, we have much to learn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That chest though, that was, that's not a pocket for you to access later, that was a random toss--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But until you decide you have no further "use of this individual, "I will put it somewhere nobody else can find it but myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you don't have any use?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that Yussa would prefer to inhabit his own flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not wanting to be possessed by an all-powerful being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Council, I do not-- "I prefer to avoid politics."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your old friend Allura, she told you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acid scarred and tattooed, but now with a goatee!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so where are we off to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The last thing you want is to be caught off guard."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any means for us to travel to Zadash quicker than 14 days on horseback?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we can bamf into the Cobalt Soul!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, that's probably a good idea..

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Archivist Zeenoth! This is the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think-- what, what! I don't think you like us, but-- (laughter) are we allowed to come there yet, because we have im-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He has only half a word. "We have im--"?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I was trying to hype man your message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything has been smoothed over, "so yes, please do come whenever."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He sounded super duper brown nosey, and he was like, hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything's been smoothed over, you're welcome anytime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, did he get in trouble?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or Dairon told him that I'm in charge now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably, I mean, Dairon probably yelled at him really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, and was like, "You call the other branches and you tell them that Beau's awesome!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! You want me to send a message to all the other--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, that's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're eventually going to want to sleep. Did we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we just got out of-- I mean, a lot happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm at-- I'm full.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Yussa, do you have any gem dust?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a diamond, do you have a diamond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wensforth?" (as Wensforth) "Yes master, what can I do for you?" (as Yussa) "Could we perhaps look around for a diamond, "what--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also just some gem dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I remember what Orly said we needed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, all sorts of different kinds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could go and look it up real fast, because I forgot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Write a swank rhyme about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was a printout or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere there was a printout, that was a while ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did, I thought I told you! That's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think of all the Tusktooth tattoos out there right now, just disappointed in you, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at my shit ass notes, of course that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that a panda I just saw on--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the amounts generally range between the 2,200 gold to 2,500 gold for all the statistical benefits, and 5,000 for the resistances.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't-- it won't push you beyond natural levels either, will it? The tattoos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So even if you've hit the maximum of 20--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --21 doesn't increase the amount of fire benefits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if you got two tattoos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only get one tattoo per individual, depending on what you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: and it was pretty much nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you tell me what statistic you're looking possibly interested in, I could find--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wrote down diamond for constitution, that would be good for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Wait, what you wrote down was wrong? (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I suck! My notes are just doodles! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody else? Anybody else need a stat that they would want--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, but it sounds extremely expensive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know how much money we just got from Halas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, J.G. Wentworth probably has some diamond dust on standby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can use charisma, strength, anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what is it you guys are wanting to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 350 gold diamond, and some diamond dust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is this all right, master?" (as Yussa) "Yes, give it to them."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And as far-- which gem did you request?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is the diamond-- I would have to take a gem "to turn it into dust, so I can convert that, "but it would still only be about--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody else? Oh god, we need a lot of gem dust.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you could ask him if he has an overabundance of rubies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did anybody check-- pick up the satchel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, check in the fucking bag!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look in the bag, look in the bag!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But then the light hits it, and it's much more polished and much brighter in its color.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a satchel of platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or unless you want to count in the middle of his chamber in front of everything, it's up to you, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, I really want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the of ease everything, it comes to about 2,100 platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which comes to about 21,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's the most money we've ever had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been D&D poor for a long time, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been sitting in those three digits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you pulled him out of a very, very rich series of halls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pumat Sol's. I just said Gilmore's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're heading to Zadash, yeah, he'll be there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to go do these tattoos--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Gilmore) "Sorry, we haven't met quite yet."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go with the premium, Gilmore brand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's up to you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Gilmore) "It's up to one of our many dozen or so franchises."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just constitution, I can wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should probably go check in on our boat, right? Do we owe taxes or marina rental or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a second to collect ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do we go? We have to go to a jewel shop for us to buy jewels?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should just go to Zadash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just said-- oh, I guess it's been a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you don't have to if you don't want to, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I could get a tattoo, you guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Had my mind on one for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then go back and like, duh duh duh duh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're uncertain as to the location of it, currently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, it's still working and moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought Orly was just hanging out here, I didn't think he was still going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been doing shipping runs, and bringing things up along the coast, earning you guys money while you've been away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's been getting us money, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might as well just buy Nicodranas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, let's go check in and see what we got!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we don't know if they're there, so we should go to the port?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much diamond dust did I need for constitution?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see if our boat's there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to see if Orly is, has stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case he's like, oh, I happened to come across 25 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution would be 2500 gold worth of diamond dust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stat bumps are 2500, resistances are five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution, intelligence are, intelligence-- so they're all 22 except for constitution, which is 25.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then the resistances are five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that is a permanent resistance to a specific damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave the Tide Peak, I'm going to head towards the port.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys make your way towards, there are two ports, if you recall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as not to make people hate me for forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the Open Quay [kway], you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yussa oversees this entire section of the city and keeps it away from the guilds that run the rest of Nicodranas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to keep, who wants to look for the Ball-Eater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both of you guys make perception checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is maybe a half mile out of port.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, I send a message! (laughter) I send a message to Orly! Orly! Come back! We are here in Nicodranas and we see the Ball-Eater and you're sailing away. Are you-- come back! Because we want to talk to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give us a m-m-moment." And you see the ship slowly begin to turn, making its way back towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that means, with what's available in Nicodranas, you couldn't double up on a statistic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have enough money to get everything? Like, one of every gem?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if you guys pick what you want and we can--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't need anything. I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want wisdom, get my ki saving throw up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like half of what we just made.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could bump some shit up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you increase anything and go to evens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just going to wait for a sword of infinite healing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, the resistances are damage type resistances?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire and cold are the two you can choose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I do strength or charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, for those who have decided to possibly get a tattoo from Orly--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we all get the same design?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we get something similar? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beauregard, should we get one of which-- what should the design be? Oh! It's the girl-- we're all going to get-- it's a girl's tattoo day!

lines.name: MARSISHA
lines.text: Wait, is it just the three of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody sticks around for the first one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we do Chaos Crew? Chaos Crew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depending on what you get, like for wisdom, it's probably going to be more like a back of the neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For constitution, it's probably going to be shoulders and chest, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if he can make--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're getting charisma? Really, it's your choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charisma's a little more amorphous, because it's not actually a location-based thing, it's more personality, so that's a little more interpretive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And which gem is associated with charisma?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That would be so pretty with your skin, Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My ugly skin, yes, it would be very pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if, when you change back, if the tattoo will stay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess there's only one way to find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She and I will work together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you find all your gems yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Orly approaches and goes up to you first, Captain Tusktooth, and goes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it's lovely to see you, Orly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, how goes the "m-m-majority of your adventures?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They've been thrilling. We've learned, we've seen, and we've grown. How fares the Ball-Eater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Got all sorts of m-money for you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whistles) He gives a big whistle, and they bring a small chest off the edge and drop it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you guys take out your money for your gem dust?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "War time m-makes for very nice profits."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll take 150 gold out of that pile and leave it for Orly, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, so wait for that back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've already been paid from the money that was--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are going to tip-- are we going to tip him or not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Orly, we've come to get some ink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of it, you can see a sort of needle element that rotates on a gear and then as he tends to wind it up almost like a loom, it begins to, tik-tik-tik-tik-tik, rather rapidly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orly, can we ask, how painful is this procedure?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When was the last time you did one of these tattoos? Is it a common thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Regular "m-m-maybe a week." He points over to one of the other deck hands who looks young, fresh-faced, one you haven't met yet, who waves, and goes, (winces) and you can see on his arm, there's still a fresh red, somewhat swollen tattoo on the arm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it infected? Is that infected?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll see you in what, call it two and a half hours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, they're not going to stay and watch us get tattoos?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Arm bone breaks between two abs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we, in addition to the fancy tattoos, can we get just a little regular tattoo to just commemorate the day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I was going to say, maybe an exploding keg of gunpowder--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, that's what I was going to say, that's stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you can be interlocking like a chain, because we're fighting the Chained Oblivion!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, but a broken chain, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Break the chains! I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have to roll a performance check? Is this going to work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so you take the crushed aquamarine dust--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to take, I would request eyeliner, permanent eyeliner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That maybe sort of swirls off and swirls up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's cool! Okay! Yeah, that's, it's almost like a Mardi Gras mask, but it's just your face in some way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I can do." Takes the dust and you see drip-- places it in the top of the small device, it goes into this glass funnel, and begins to wind it up with his large tortle foot, and as it does, you can hear the grinding sound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put a stick in that big goblin mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a perpetual almost like a chant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said he would apprentice me a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But describe how well you handle-- I guess make a constitution saving throw for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drink, drink to hold on and just go limp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, pushing in towards the, at this point--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come to consciousness in the chair on the edge of the ship, you wake up to the immediate smell of ocean spray and salt in the air and brine, and you glance over and see this big, smiling tortle face with the one eye patch go, "Hmm, some "of my best work."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys all look at Nott, and Nott is a little swollen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really shimmery, it looks really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go to sleep now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to get ours done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there you go. With that completed, you get a permanent plus one bonus to your charisma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to go, or you want me to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what m-m-might you be looking "to put on your canvas?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm using diamond dust, here you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was wondering if you could make it look like, almost like a small cape, you know, like the one that I used to wear? The little short one? Like, covering my shoulders and my chest? And then right here, I want two hands, like this in front, like the Traveler is hugging me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I can do." Begins to wind up the machine, you can hear the grinding sound within.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I getting naked in front of Orly?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, as you're doing my tattoo on my chest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly looks at you and goes, "Whatever makes you comfortable."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take off bits of the armor and the outfit and tie the tube top around, you can now see, if you guys are there, Jester, as cute as she is and as billowing as her outfit is, having her just there with the tube top on, especially in a Beau-esque type outfit, fucking ripped!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try to make it not seem like I'm checking her out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add my new modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little longer, because he's now dealing with a rag doll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll try and lift her head up occasionally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a slight tinge of just ever-present pain across your torso.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get a permanent plus one to your constitution.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still up for it? You've been doing a lot of work. You're not going to trip on the fucking finish line?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Winds it up, what kind of tattoo do you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out Molly's tarot cards, and I flip through the tarot cards until I find the design of the All-Seeing Eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because he had that on the back of his neck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I point out the other filigree on the card, and tell him to just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I can do for you." Now you're turning the other way on the chair, as opposed to everyone else, who's been sitting in the front of it, you're actually with your chest against the back of the chair, leaning forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doing the downward dog in the middle of the wharf.

lines.name: LAURA

And the second part of that is, because to me, I'm watching Caleb's journey, and I want him to become more powerful, and I want him to do all these things, but at the end of the day, I don't give a shit, I want him to forgive himself, because at the end of the day, after all the creatures, and after all the monsters, and after all the stuff is done, it's not going to change his opinion of himself, right? And the other thing is is, people, is you can get addicted to grief.

You're letting what's happening and you're letting the other players, and what they say to you affect you and change you and go, this guy, he's malleable to me, you know, I fucking love that, man! It's cool to see.
